radiographic_examinations.findings: The transplant liver displays a mild fatty infiltration; esophageal/paraesophageal varices and intra-abdominal collateral vessels identified due to portal hypertension; small right-sided adrenal nodules stable; mild thickening of the left adrenal gland; no free air, free fluid, or pathologically enlarged lymph nodes; no biliary dilatation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Stable adrenal nodules and adrenal gland thickening.
